column6: delivery_focus_notes\
Entry trim \'96 focus on basic controls, SmartSense safety, phone pairing, simple audio and climate, no advanced luxury features.\
Adds more convenience (keyless, nicer interior touches) \'96 highlight drive modes if equipped, upgraded infotainment, and extra USB/power options.\
Top Venue \'96 emphasize LED lighting, sunroof (if equipped), navigation/upgraded screen, and any extra driver-assist features vs SE/SEL.\
Entry trim \'96 same core Venue delivery: controls, SmartSense basics, phone pairing, simple climate. Call out that AWD is not available.\
Single higher trim for 2026 \'96 cover style upgrades, H-Tex/cloth seating if present, two-tone roof and cosmetic changes, plus same tech as SE.\
Base Kona \'96 explain digital cluster, basic safety, drive modes, phone pairing, and simple climate/audio; no sunroof or advanced camera systems.\
Adds comfort features (heated seats, more USBs, possible roof rails) \'96 show convenience features and any extra SmartSense items.\
Step up trim \'96 highlight larger screen, more driver-assist features (HDA, etc. where equipped), push-button start and keyless access.\
Sport appearance \'96 emphasize sport styling, wheel/tire differences, paddle shifters if equipped; same core tech as mid trims.\
Sport-focused \'96 tour N Line styling, possible sport seats and tuning; still cover daily-use features first (safety, phone, cruise).\
Top gas Kona \'96 emphasize full digital cockpit, Surround View (if equipped), power/ventilated seats, premium audio, and sunroof.\
Entry EV \'96 focus on charging basics, range display, regen modes, scheduled charging, climate vs range, and smartphone app connectivity.\
Adds heated seats, power driver seat, roof rails, more comfort \'96 cover same EV fundamentals plus extra comfort switches and memory where present.\
Performance-styled EV \'96 explain same EV controls with extra attention to drive modes, sport feel, N Line interior/exterior and premium audio.\
Top EV \'96 highlight advanced driver assistance, surround/parking cameras if equipped, Bose audio, ambient lighting, power seat/memory.\
Base 2026 Kona \'96 focus on updated interior, digital screens, SmartSense basics, phone pairing, drive modes.\
Adds more style and features \'96 cover upgraded wheels, convenience features, and any added driver assists vs SE.\
Comfort-focused \'96 emphasize H-Tex seats, larger wheels, upgraded cluster, and extra comfort/tech for daily use.\
Top trim \'96 show all tech: big screens, advanced safety suite, ambient lighting (if equipped), sunroof, and premium audio.\
Base Tucson \'96 focus on 12.3-inch touchscreen, SmartSense safety, basic cruise control, drive modes, phone pairing, climate controls.\
Adds heated seats, 8-way power driver seat, dual auto climate, wireless charging \'96 demonstrate seat/comfort settings and Digital Key if equipped.\
Highlights: 12.3-inch cluster, nav, ambient lighting, sunroof \'96 cover cluster customization, navigation, HDA, and liftgate if included.\
Adventure look \'96 show tow hitch, cladding, possible AWD setup, terrain-related drive modes, and roof features while still covering tech basics.\
Sporty trim \'96 emphasize N Line styling, sport seats, paddles if available; delivery still prioritizes safety systems and infotainment first.\
Top gas Tucson \'96 cover HUD (if equipped), Surround View, Remote Smart Parking Assist, leather seats, ventilated seats, Bose audio, panoramic roof.\
Efficiency-focused hybrid \'96 explain hybrid system behavior, EV mode, regen, fuel economy screens; show same safety/infotainment basics as SE/SEL.\
Comfort + efficiency \'96 highlight added tech (bigger screens, HDA), hybrid energy info, and smart liftgate if included.\
Sportier hybrid \'96 emphasize performance feel of hybrid plus N styling, but cover hybrid-specific displays and charge/regen behavior first.\
Top hybrid \'96 same Limited tech (HUD, SVM, RSPA, Bose, leather/vent seats) plus hybrid-specific range/energy displays.\
PHEV \'96 focus hard on charging, EV range, charging ports, charge settings, and mode switching; then standard Tucson tech & safety.\
Fully loaded PHEV \'96 combine PHEV delivery (charging, EV mode, scheduling) with full Limited suite (HUD, premium audio, cameras, luxury touches).\
Base 2026 Tucson \'96 similar to 2025 but updated; focus on revised interior, large screens, SmartSense, phone pairing, basic cruise.\
Adds comfort/convenience; cover heated seats, power seat, extra safety items, and any Digital Key or wireless charging.\
Adventure trim \'96 emphasize appearance + light off-road readiness, tow options, AWD configuration, while not skipping tech/safety walkthrough.\
Near-top \'96 highlight extra luxury/tech over SEL: more cameras, nicer interior, possibly sunroof and advanced HDA.\
Top 2026 gas Tucson \'96 full tech suite; focus on HUD (if fitted), Surround View, RSPA, ambient lighting, premium audio and seat comfort.\
Base hybrid for 2026 \'96 explain hybrid system first, then standard safety and 12.3-inch display behavior.\
Mid hybrid \'96 blend comfort and efficiency; cover hybrid energy screens plus upgraded interior features vs Blue.\
More loaded hybrid \'96 treat like Limited-lite: more cameras, more tech, still hybrid-focused delivery on efficiency and regen.\
Top hybrid \'96 same Limited feature walk as gas but with emphasis on hybrid powertrain, energy usage displays and EV-like behavior.\
Carry-over PHEV SEL \'96 charging and EV mode explanation first, then Tucson features; stress plug-in charging vs standard hybrid.\
Top PHEV SEL \'96 combines full PHEV explanation with Limited-level comfort and tech features.\
New body style \'96 explain seating configuration, drive selector, safety systems, phone pairing, and basic drive modes.\
Adds convenience (heated seats, more tech) \'96 cover comfort controls and any liftgate settings.\
More rugged \'96 explain roof rails, towing, terrain-oriented drive modes; treat tech similar to SEL.\
Luxury-leaning \'96 focus on leather, ventilated seats, sunroof, advanced cameras and audio, cluster customization.\
Top luxury \'96 same Limited items plus maximum soft-touch/premium details; emphasize ambient lighting and highest driver-assist package.\
Hybrid \'96 explain powertrain, EV mode, regen, and energy screens; then same SEL comfort/tech as gas.\
Upscale hybrid \'96 combine hybrid delivery with Limited luxury (leather, cameras, audio, seats).\
Top hybrid \'96 emphasize quietness, range, comfort, ambient lighting, full safety suite and HUD if equipped.\
2026 update \'96 call out new 8-speed auto vs old DCT, then same essential delivery: controls, safety, phone, drive modes. \
Adds comfort/convenience vs SE \'96 highlight interior upgrades, heated seats, and liftgate options.\
Rugged trim \'96 emphasize appearance, towing, AWD, and terrain drive modes, still covering safety and phone basics.\
Near-top \'96 focus on advanced cameras, HUD (if present), upgraded seats and interior materials.\
Top gas \'96 full luxury; walkthrough of all comfort/tech features plus driver profiles, ambient lighting, and seat/memory.\
Hybrid SEL \'96 same as 2025 hybrid SEL delivery: power split explanation, regen, energy screens, and comfort tech.\
Hybrid Limited \'96 combine hybrid talk with Limited-level tech and seating.\
Hybrid Calligraphy \'96 flagship; focus on quiet hybrid drive, full luxury cabin, and full active safety stack.\
Base three-row \'96 cover seating controls, rear climate, safety systems, basic cruise, and phone pairing for families.\
Adds more comfort and seat options (captain\'92s chairs available) \'96 show 2nd/3rd row access, USBs, and power seat adjustments.\
Rugged appearance \'96 explain roof/tire aesthetic, towing, and HTRAC AWD usage for family trips.\
Family comfort trim \'96 focus on 2nd-row comforts, available sunroof(s), and extra tech versus SEL.\
Luxury \'96 walkthrough of leather seating, surround view, HUD (if equipped), premium audio, seat ventilation/heating.\
Top luxury \'96 emphasize highest-end interior, ambient lighting, unique wheels, and full driving-assist features.\
Appearance variant \'96 same features as Calligraphy with dark styling; focus more on look differences, same tech walkthrough.\
New-gen Palisade \'96 bigger footprint; cover dual 12.3-inch displays, safety basics, seat/fold functions, and HTRAC overview.\
Adds comfort \'96 show 2nd-row upgrades, power seats, and family-focused features.\
More tech \'96 emphasize extra driver assists, upgraded screens, and convenience features vs SEL.\
High-content gas trim \'96 focus on near-luxury interior, sunroof, and camera features.\
Off-road styled \'96 explain appearance, tow capabilities, HTRAC modes, while still doing full tech/safety overview.\
Premium gas \'96 highlight leather, ambient lighting, cameras, HUD (if equipped), and premium audio.\
Top gas \'96 full luxury; focus on comfort, quietness, and full driver assistance stack.\
Entry hybrid \'96 emphasize hybrid operation, EV crawl in traffic, range, and how HTRAC behaves with hybrid system.\
Hybrid SEL \'96 same as Blue SEL with more comfort/tech; show energy screens and EV/engine transitions.\
Comfort-heavy hybrid \'96 focus on long-trip comfort, charging (regenerative only), and family amenities.\
Premium hybrid \'96 blend hybrid-fuel savings explanation with Limited luxury tech.\
Top hybrid \'96 ultimate comfort + hybrid system; make sure to show all driver-assist and display customization.\
Base sedan \'96 cover SmartSense basics, basic cluster, cruise, phone pairing, and simple climate/audio layout.\
Adds features and slightly sportier look \'96 highlight extra comfort and wheel upgrades vs SE.\
More tech \'96 emphasize larger screen, more safety tech, possibly sunroof and wireless charging.\
Sport variant \'96 explain turbo engine behavior, drive modes, paddle shifters, and sport seats while still showing safety basics.\
Top gas Elantra \'96 cover full safety suite, leather, Bose audio (if equipped), and digital cluster customization.\
Efficiency trim \'96 explain hybrid system, EV mode, regen, and fuel-economy coaching screens.\
Mid hybrid \'96 mix of efficiency and comfort; cover extra features beyond Blue and how they affect daily driving.\
Top hybrid \'96 add luxury/tech walk to hybrid explanation (leather, sunroof, premium audio, full safety).\
Updated 2026 Elantra \'96 same base delivery: controls, SmartSense, phone, simple cluster.\
Adds equipment over SE \'96 explain extra comfort/safety, wheels, and tech.\
Higher-content SEL \'96 treat like prior SEL Convenience; highlight dual 12.3-inch displays where equipped, nav, and advanced safety.\
Top 2026 Elantra \'96 walk through all tech, cluster modes, leather, and driver-assist settings.\
Entry \'96 show new styling, 12.3-inch display, SmartSense, basic cruise, and phone pairing.\
Adds comfort and features; highlight keyless entry, heated seats, and convenience upgrades vs SE.\
Big tech jump \'96 emphasize dual screens, nav, wireless charging, and extra driver-assist features.\
Performance trim \'96 turbo engine, N transmission, sport seats; cover performance features but still teach safety/assist systems clearly.\
Hybrid \'96 explain gauge cluster energy flow, EV mode, and efficiency tips plus typical SEL comforts.\
Top hybrid \'96 add leather, panoramic roof, Blind-Spot View Monitor, and Remote Smart Parking Assist walkthrough to hybrid basics.\
Base \'96 explain truck bed features, underfloor storage, tailgate use plus standard SUV-style safety/infotainment.\
Adds convenience (heated seats, keyless) \'96 highlight bed utility plus comfort upgrades.\
Turbo AWD adventure trim \'96 explain engine difference, AWD system, and extra tow/off-road aids.\
Top trim \'96 cover HDA, Surround View, Blind-Spot View Monitor, premium audio, and all bed/utility tricks.\
Base 2026 \'96 same delivery as 2025 SE with updated content; focus on bed usage, safety, and phone pairing.\
Adds comfort \'96 show heated seats, keyless access, and infotainment upgrades.\
Activity/\'93Night\'94-style trim \'96 emphasize lifestyle accessories, appearance, and added convenience features.\
Turbo AWD \'96 stress performance, towing, and AWD modes plus full tech/safety walkthrough.\
Full luxury Santa Cruz \'96 focus on all camera systems, HDA, leather, and premium audio.\
Base battery \'96 teach charging (home/DC), range, route planning, and basic infotainment; rear-motor only.\
Larger pack \'96 emphasize range upgrade, available AWD, and same EV interface; show charge scheduling and climate preconditioning.\
Adds comfort/tech (power seats, upgraded interior) \'96 highlight HDA, wireless charging, and interior ambient touches.\
Adventure-themed \'96 show appearance, possible AWD, tow rating, and utility while keeping EV training first.\
Top trim \'96 cover full HUD, premium audio, ventilated seats, full camera suite, and most advanced driver assistance.\
High-performance EV \'96 emphasize N drive modes, N e-Shift, track functions, launch control, while still teaching day-to-day EV use, charging, and safety.\
Similar trim structure with lower pricing \'96 same EV delivery, mention included dual-amperage charger and new color options.\
Same as 2025 SE \'96 emphasize range, AWD availability, and charging.\
Mid trim \'96 comfort/tech step up; same delivery as 2025 SEL.\
Adventure EV \'96 focus on AWD and outdoors usage plus EV fundamentals.\
Top 2026 \'96 full luxury and tech; same delivery pattern as 2025 Limited.\
Carry-over performance EV \'96 stress N features and track vs street settings.\
Base battery \'96 explain aero sedan range advantage, charging, EV screens, and drive modes.\
Bigger pack \'96 same EV training plus more range; mention RWD vs AWD choice.\
Adds comfort tech \'96 show extra driver assists, interior upgrades, and any audio/lighting enhancements.\
Top trim \'96 emphasize full safety suite, HUD (if equipped), premium audio, and seat comfort.\
Similar structure \'96 EV basics unchanged; updated styling if present.\
Mid-range \'96 same EV explanation plus more comfort than SE SR.\
Higher content \'96 more driver-assist and interior upgrades.\
Top comfort/tech \'96 same delivery pattern as 2025 Limited.\
High-performance sedan \'96 explain N dual-motor power, N Grin Boost, performance modes, while emphasizing everyday range/charging and safety.\
Base 3-row EV \'96 explain 3-row layout, 110 kWh battery, single-motor RWD, charging, and family safety/tech basics.\
AWD SE \'96 add explanation of dual-motor AWD vs S; focus on traction and weather confidence.\
More comfort and tech \'96 highlight seating upgrades, extra driver-assist, and more premium feel.\
Performance AWD \'96 emphasize higher output, possible larger wheels/tires, while still focusing on family usability and range.\
Top luxury \'96 full interior upgrade + performance; focus on refinement, quietness, and full tech suite.\
Style-focused flagship \'96 same feature content as Performance Calligraphy with unique design touches; deliver as ultimate premium family EV.\
